title: Java Fullstack Developer
aboutMe: Stian er en fullstack Javautvikler med erfaring fra Java og JavaScript. I tillegg har utvikleren kunnskap om ulike rammeverk og teknologier som som baserer seg på disse programmeringsspråkene. Han har jobbet mye i NodeJS, Angular og React. Med spesiell interesse for applikasjonsutvikling.

experience.title: Java Fullstack Developer

experience.title: Backoffice

experience.title: Employee
experience.description: Service of customers and sorting goods.

education.description: A broad introduction to information- and communication technology. Particular weight placed on the programming languages Java, JavaScript, CSS and HTML.
Introduction to political systems (and comparing these) in various countries and their political history. Particular weight placed on political development of current political relations in Europe.
Studies of grammar and phonetics, sociolinguistic aspects of the English language, modern linguistics, language history and British and American literature and culture.

Introduction in important aspects of the community development, in and outside Norway, in older and modern time. Introduction in how historians work with providing and creating knowledge of the past, and how different methodical approaches affects the interpretation and knowledge of the past.
